max_idle_move: Duration in minutes, set it to 0 to disable it
max_idle_kick: Duration in minutes, set it to 0 ti disable it
target_cid: The channel id (cid) where AFK clients are moved
target_cpw: The channel password where AFK clients are moved
reason_kick: Give this reason when AFK clients are kick from the server
reason_idle: If not empty, send private message to the client when idle time id exceeded, if kick mode is enabled the message is the reason kick
reason_muted: If not empty, send a message when the client mute his output
headset_muted: If set to true the action is performed while the client mute teamspeak
headset_muted_delay: Delay in minutes before move clients who's muted their output
